title.rendered: JOB POST: Junior PHP Developer at IIM Ahmedabad [Exp of 1-2 Years, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript]: Apply by April 3

content.rendered:
Job applications are invited for Junior PHP Developer at IIM Ahmedabad for the year 2025. The last date of application is April 3.

Job Description

We are looking for a passionate and detail-oriented Junior PHP Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will work alongside senior developers to create, improve, and maintain web applications. This role is perfect for someone eager to grow their technical skills in a collaborative and innovative environment.

Eligibility

  • Requirements:
    • Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
    • 1-2 years of relevant experience.
  • Technical Skills:
    • Proficiency in PHP and familiarity with modern PHP frameworks (e.g., Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symfony).
    • Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
    • Understanding of MySQL or other relational databases.
    • Experience working with version control tools such as Git is a plus.
    • Ability to troubleshoot issues and debug code effectively.
    • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
    • Eagerness to learn and work collaboratively in a team environment.
    • Good verbal and written communication skills.
  • Preferred Skills (Optional):
    • Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web services.
    • Knowledge of front-end frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular.
    • Exposure to Content Management Systems (CMS) like WordPress.
    • Understanding of Agile development processes.
  • Age: Maximum 30 years

How to Apply?

Interested candidates are required to share their updated resumes on career@iima.ac.in with subject line “Application for Junior PHP Developer” latest by April 03, 2025.

Responsibilities

  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented PHP code to develop and enhance web applications.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize existing code and systems.
  • Assist in the design, development, and implementation of new features.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of code quality.
  • Support database management and handle basic SQL queries.
  • Test applications for performance, responsiveness, and security.
  • Stay updated with industry trends, technologies, and best practices in PHP development.

Work Location

IIM Ahmedabad Campus, Ahmedabad, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad.
